bug.author: bartonaz
bug.summary: Wrong lemmatization of words with -ed ending in basic form
bug.description:
Lemmatization in the english model of Spacy wrongly removes ed ending from words that have it in their basic form:
need > ne feed > fee bleed > ble
It would be nice if such words were properly taken into account by the lemmatizer.

comments.comment: Thanks, I'm not sure when this regression was introduced. I could've sworn we had tests for this.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
